name: Debrup Mondal
responsibility_sentences: Building cloud migration pipelines with ETL and ELT processes
Conducting unit testing and data integrity testing
Designing and implementing Lambda architecture solutions
Ensuring data quality, lineage, and incremental data processing
Implementing continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines
Managing Personally Identifiable Information compliance with GDPR and CCPA
Optimizing costing and security governance for data platforms
Tuning clusters and monitoring business intelligence dashboards
Utilizing Azure Functions, Event Hubs, Kafka, and Autoloader for data ingestion
